Verses: 1 indhak Kaariyangal Nadandhapinbu, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Aabiraamukku Dharisanaththile Undaagi, Avar: Aabiraame, Nee Bayappadaadhe; Naan Unakkuk Kedagamum, Unakku Magaa Periya Balanumaayirukkiren Endraar.
2 adharku Aabiraam: Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Adiyenukku Enna Tharuveer? Naan Pillaiyillaamal Irukkirene; Dhamasku Ooraanaagiya Indha Eliyesar En Veettu Visaaranaik Karththanaai Irukkiraane Endraan.
3 pinnum Aabiraam: Dhevareer Enakkup Puththira Sandhaanam Arulavillai; Idho En Veettile Pirandha Pillai Enakku Sudhandharavaaliyaai Irukkiraan Endraan.
4 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Avanukku Undaagi: Ivan Unakku Sudhandharavaaliyalla, Un Garppappirappaayiruppavane Unakku Sudhandharavaaliyaavaan Endru Solli,

5 avar Avanai Veliye Azhaiththu: Nee Vaanaththai Annaandhu Paar, Natchaththirangalai Enna Unnaale Koodumaanaal, Avaigalai Ennu Endru Solli; Pinbu Avanai Nokki: Un Sandhadhi Ivvannamaai Irukkum Endraar.
6 avan Karththarai Visuvaasiththaan, Adhai Avar Avanukku Needhiyaaga Enninaar.
7 pinnum Avar Avanai Nokki: Indha Dhesaththai Unakku Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkumporuttu, Unnai Oor Engira Kaltheyarudaiya Pattanaththilirundhu Azhaiththu Vandha Karththar Naane Endraar.
8 adharku Avan: Karththaraagiya Aandavare, Naan Adhai Sudhandhariththukkolven Endru Edhinaal Ariven Endraan.
9 adharku Avar: Moondru Vayadhuk Kidaariyaiyum, Moondru Vayadhu Vellaattaiyum, Moondru Vayadhu Aattukkadaavaiyum, Oru Kaattuppuraavaiyum, Oru Puraakkunjaiyum, Ennidaththil Konduvaa Endraar.
10 avan Avaigal Ellaavatraiyum Avaridaththil Konduvandhu, Avaigalai Naduvaagath Thundiththu, Thundangalai Ondrukkondru Edhiraaga Vaiththaan; Patchigalai Avan Thundikkavillai.
11 paravaigal Andha Udalgalinmel Irangina; Avaigalai Aabiraam Thuraththinaan.
12 sooriyan Asthamikkumpodhu, Aabiraamukku Ayarndha Niththirai Vandhadhu; Thigilum Kaarirulum Avanai Moodikkondadhu.

13 appozhudhu Avar Aabiraamai Nokki: Un Sandhadhiyaar Thangaludaiyadhallaadha Anniya Dhesaththile Paradhesigalaayirundhu, Aththesaththaarai Sevippaargal Endrum, Avargalaal Naanooru Varusham Ubaththiravappaduvaargal Endrum, Nee Nichchayamaai Ariyakkadavaai.
14 ivargal Sevikkum Jaadhigalai Naan Nyaayantheerppen; Pinbu Migundha Porulkaludane Purappattu Varuvaargal.
15 nee Samaadhaanaththode Un Pidhaakkalidaththil Seruvaai; Nalla Mudhirvayadhile Adakkampannappaduvaai.
16 naalaam Thalaimuraiyile Avargal Ivvidaththukkuth Thirumba Varuvaargal; Enendraal Emoriyarudaiya Akkiramam Innum Niraivaagavillai Endraar.
17 sooriyan Asthamiththuk Kaarirul Undaanapinbu, Idho, Pugaikira Soolaiyum, Andhath Thundangalin Naduve Kadandhupogira Akkinijuvaalaiyum Thondrina.
18 annaalile Karththar Aabiraamode Udanpadikkaipanni, Egipthin Nadhi Thuvakki Aipiraaththu Nadhi Ennum Periya Nadhimattumulladhum
19 keniyarum, Kenisiyarum, Kadhmoniyarum,
20 eththiyarum, Perisiyarum, Reppaayeemiyarum,
21 emoriyarum, Kaanaaniyarum, Kirkaasiyarum, Epoosiyarum Enbavargal Irukkiradhumaana Indha Dhesaththai Un Sandhadhikkuk Koduththen Endraar.
